attachments.title: Someone Made A VR Game Out Of A Night At The Roxbury
attachments.text: Ah the Roxbury Guys sketch! It's one of the most memorable sketches (and lesser movies) to come out of SNL in the mid-90s. Now you can experience it in stunning virtual reality!
attachments.fallback: Kotaku: Someone Made A VR Game Out Of A Night At The Roxbury

text: I also am betting on some major motion sickness from all that awesome
hopefully not with Oculus' new model, but I guess that won't be out for a while anyway
Well, it depends the developer almost as much as the hardware. Framerate and refresh will be a big part of a 'head active' game like this. Crystal cove should help with some of that  too.
